title: 404: Page not found
raw_markdown:
## Cookie preferences
### Cookies used by Google Analytics
We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the website so we can improve it. We have configured Google Analytics to anonymise your IP address so that you are not personally identified. We gather information on:
  * How you got to the site
  * The pages you visit on citizensinformation.ie, and how long you spend on each page
  * What you click while you are visiting the site

Allow analytics cookies
Save preferences  Close 
## Cookies on citizensinformation.ie
We use cookies to collect information about how you use citizensinformation.ie. This helps us to improve your experience. You can find out more about the cookies we use in our [Cookie notice](https://www.citizensinformation.ie/en/cookies.html). You can also read our [Privacy policy](https://www.citizensinformation.ie/en/privacy.html).   
  
You can accept all cookies or you can chose which cookies to accept or reject. You can change your cookie preferences at any time by using the My cookie preferences link at the bottom of each page. 
Reject cookies  Manage my preferences  Accept all cookies 
[Skip navigation and go to main content](https://www.citizensinformation.ie/en/justice/victims-of-crime/domestic-violence/#startcontent)
# We're sorry...
Either the link you clicked is broken or the page you requested on citizensinformation.ie does not exist.
We recently made some technical changes to the website and the web addresses (urls) have changed. Please let us know what link you clicked to get to this page by emailing us at ciofeedback@ciboard.ie.
You can also take these additional steps:
  * Make sure you entered the correct web address
  * Use our search tool (it's just above, in the main navigation bar) to find what you are looking for
  * Use our [homepage](https://www.citizensinformation.ie/en/) as a starting point to get an overview of the website
  * [Contact us](https://www.citizensinformation.ie/en/about/contact-us) if you have a specific question


[](https://www.citizensinformation.ie/en/justice/victims-of-crime/domestic-violence/#startcontent "Back to top")
